dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA  94043

Attention Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Dear Sir or Madam:
The Web site, http://sololabiblia.blogspot.com/2011/01/los-12-apostoles-segunda-parte.html, has, without authorization, reproduced Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania's (Watch Tower) copyrighted material.

Watch Tower, the holder of the copyright of the images and text, has not given the owner of the site permission to reproduce and distribute its material. Hence, such unauthorized use of the material violates U.S. copyright law.

The material reproduced is taken from Watch Tower's publication. The location where the infringing material is noted below:

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_p0gOvfySb2s/TQkknb8vFHI/AAAAAAAAAX0/jKNzfedrP3g/s320/12apostolesdejesus.jpg



We hereby request that you take all steps necessary to remove the infringing material from the referenced Web site and that you advise us in writing within ten (10) days of the date of this letter whether or not you will take the requested action.

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.



I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials.
Yours very truly,

/s/: Ronald L. Slater

Ronald L. Slater
Associate General Counsel
Watch Tower Bible and Tract
 Society of Pennsylvania
100 Watchtower Drive
Patterson, NY  12563
845-306-1000 (phone)
845-306-0709 (fax)
